Verses: 1 yesu Dhevaalayaththai Vittup Purappattuppogaiyil, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Dhevaalayaththin Kattadangalai Avarukkuk Kaanpikka Avaridaththil Vandhaargal.
2 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Ivaigalaiyellaam Paarkkireergale, Ivvidaththil Oru Kallinmel Oru Kalliraadhapadikku Ellaam Idikkappattuppogum Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.

3 pinbu, Avar Olivamalaiyin Mel Utkaarndhirukkaiyil, Seeshargal Avaridaththil Thaniththuvandhu: Ivaigal Eppozhudhu Sampavikkum? Ummudaiya Varugaikkum, Ulagaththin Mudivukkum Adaiyaalam Enna? Engalukku Sollavendum Endraargal.
4 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Oruvanum Ungalai Vanjiyaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal;
5 enenil, Anegar Vandhu, En Naamaththaith Thariththukkondu: Naane Kiristhu Endru Solli, Anegarai Vanjippaargal.
6 yuththangalaiyum Yuththangalin Seydhigalaiyum Kelvippaduveergal; Kalangaadhapadi Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Ivaigalellaam Sampavikkavendiyadhe; Aanaalum Mudivu Udane Varaadhu.
7 janaththukku Virodhamaai Janamum, Raajyaththukku Virodhamaai Raajyamum Ezhumpum; Panjangalum, Kollainoigalum, Boomiyadhirchchigalum Pala Idangalil Undaagum.
8 ivaigalellaam Vedhanaigalukku Aarampam.
9 appozhudhu, Ungalai Ubaththiravangalukku Oppukkoduththu, Ungalaik Kolaiseyvaargal; En Naamaththinimiththam Neengal Sagala Janangalaalum Pagaikkappaduveergal.
10 appozhudhu, Anegar Idaraladaindhu, Oruvaraiyoruvar Kaattikkoduththu, Oruvaraiyoruvar Pagaippaargal.
11 anegang Kallaththeerkkadharisigalum Ezhumbi, Anegarai Vanjippaargal.
12 akkiramam Migudhiyaavadhinaal Anegarudaiya Anbu Thanindhupom.
13 mudivupariyandham Nilainirpavane Ratchikkappaduvaan.
14 raajyaththinudaiya Indha Suvisesham Boologamengumulla Sagala Jaadhigalukkum Saatchiyaagap Pirasangikkappadum, Appodhu Mudivu Varum.
15 melum, Paazhaakkugira Aruvaruppaik Kuriththuth Thaaniyel Theerkkadharisi Solliyirukkiraane. Vaasikkiravan Sindhikkakkadavan. Neengal Adhaip Parisuththa Sthalaththil Nirkak Kaanumpodhu,
16 yoodheyaavil Irukkiravargal Malaigalukku Odippogakkadavargal.
17 veettinmel Irukkiravan Than Veettile Edhaiyaagilum Eduppadharku Irangaadhirukkakkadavan.
18 vayalil Irukkiravan Than Vasthirangalai Eduppadharkuth Thirumpaadhirukkakkadavan.
19 annaatkalile Karppavadhigalukkum Paalkodukkiravargalukkum Aiyo.
20 neengal Odippovadhu Maarikaalaththilaavadhu Oivunaalilaavadhu, Sampaviyaadhapadikku Vendikkollungal.
21 enenil, Ulagamundaanadhumudhal Idhuvaraikkum Sampaviththiraadhadhum, Inimelum Sampaviyaadhadhumaana Migundha Ubaththiravam Appozhudhu Undaayirukkum.
22 annaatkal Kuraikkappadaadhirundhaal, Oruvanaagilum Thappippovadhillai; Therindhukollappattavargalinimiththamo Andha Naatkal Kuraikkappadum.
23 appozhudhu, Idho Kiristhu Inge Irukkiraar, Adho Ange Irukkiraar Endru Evanaagilum Sonnaal Nampaadheyungal.
24 enenil, Kallakkiristhukkalum Kallaththeerkkadharisigalum Ezhumpi, Koodumaanaal Therindhukollappattavargalaiyum Vanjikkaththagadhaaga Periya Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Seyvaargal.
25 idho, Munnadhaaga Ungalukku Ariviththirukkiren.
26 aagaiyaal: Adho, Vanaandharaththil Irukkiraar Endru Solvaargalaanaal Purappadaadhirungal; Idho, Araiveettirkul Irukkiraar Endru Solvaargalaanaal Nampaadhirungal.
27 minnal Kizhakkilirundhu Thondri Merku Varaikkum Pirakaasikkiradhupola, Manushakumaaranudaiya Varugaiyum Irukkum.
28 pinam Engeyo Ange Kazhukugal Vandhu Koodum.
29 annaatkalin Ubaththiravam Mudindhavudane, Sooriyan Andhakaarappadum, Sandhiran Oliyaikkodaadhirukkum, Natchaththirangal Vaanaththilirundhu Vizhum, Vaanaththin Saththuvangal Asaikkappadum.

30 appozhudhu, Manushakumaaranudaiya Adaiyaalam Vaanaththil Kaanappadum. Appozhudhu, Manushakumaaran Vallamaiyodum Migundha Magimaiyodum Vaanaththin Megangalmel Varugiradhai Boomiyilulla Sagala Koththiraththaarum Kandu Pulampuvaargal.

31 valuvaaith Thonikkum Ekkaala Saththaththode Avar Thamadhu Thoodhargalai Anuppuvaar; Avargal Avaraal Therindhukollappattavargalai Vaanaththin Oru Munai Mudharkondu Marumunaimattum Naalu Thisaigalilumirundhu Koottichcherppaargal.
32 aththimaraththinaal Oru Uvamaiyaik Katrukkollungal; Adhile Ilangilai Thondri, Thulirvidumpodhu, Vasandha Kaalam Sameebamaayitru Endru Ariveergal.
33 appadiye Ivaigalaiyellaam Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Avar Sameebamaai Vaasalaruge Vandhirukkiraar Endru Ariyungal.
34 ivaigalellaam Sampavikkumunne Indha Sandhadhi Ozhindhupogaadhendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
35 vaanamum Boomiyum Ozhindhupom, En Vaarththaigalo Ozhindhupovadhillai.
36 andha Naalaiyum Andha Naazhikaikalaiyum En Pidhaa Oruvar Thavira Matroruvanum Ariyaan; Paralogaththilulla Thoodhargalum Ariyaargal.
37 novaavin Kaalaththil Eppadi Nadandhadho, Appadiye Manushakumaaran Varum Kaalaththilum Nadakkum.
38 eppadiyenil, Jalappiralayaththukku Munnaana Kaalaththile Novaa Pezhaikkul Piravesikkum Naal Varaikkum, Janangal Pusiththum Kudiththum, Penkondum Penkoduththum,
39 jalappiralayam Vandhu Anaivaraiyum Vaarikkondupogumattum Unaraadhirundhaargal; Appadiye Manushakumaaran Varungaalaththilum Nadakkum.
40 appozhudhu, Iranduper Vayalil Iruppaargal; Oruvan Etrukkollappaduvaan, Oruvan Kaividappaduvaan.
41 irandu Sthireegal Endhiram Araiththukkontiruppaargal; Oruththi Etrukkollappaduvaal, Oruththi Kaividappaduvaal.
42 ungal Aandavar Inna Naazhikaiyile Varuvaarendru Neengal Ariyaadhirukkirapadiyinaal Vizhiththirungal.
43 thirudan Inna Jaamaththil Varuvaanendru Veettejamaan Arindhirundhaal, Avan Vizhiththirundhu, Than Veettaik Kannamidavottaanendru Ariveergal.
44 neengal Ninaiyaadha Naazhikaiyile Manushakumaaran Varuvaar; Aadhalaal, Neengalum Aayaththamaayirungal.
45 etravelaiyile Than Velaikkaararukkup Pojanangoduththu Avargalai Visaarikkumpadi Ejamaan Vaiththa Unmaiyum Vivegamumulla Oozhiyakkaaran Yaavan?
46 ejamaan Varumpodhu Appadichseygiravanaagak Kaanappadugira Oozhiyakkaarane Paakkiyavaan.
47 than Aasdhigal Ellaavatrinmelum Avanai Visaaranaikkaaranaaga Vaippaanendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
48 andha Oozhiyakkaarano Pollaadhavanaayirundhu: En Aandavan Vara Naal Sellum Endru Than Ullaththile Sollikkondu,
49 than Udanvelaikkaararai Adikkath Thodangi, Veriyarode Pusikkavum Kudikkavum Thalaippattaal,
50 andha Oozhiyakkaaran Ninaiyaadha Naalilum, Ariyaadha Naazhikaiyilum, Avanudaiya Ejamaan Vandhu,
51 avanaik Kadinamaaith Thandiththu, Maayakkaararode Avanukkup Pangai Niyamippaan; Ange Azhugaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkum.
